mapper.select: SELECT aai.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community_board_good cbg WHERE cbg.cb_id = cb.cb_id) AS "good" FROM abandoned_animal_info aai WHERE happen_dt BETWEEN CURDATE()-interval '100' day AND CURDATE() ORDER BY good DESC, hit DESC LIMIT 0, 20

SELECT *, name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community_board_good cbg WHERE cbg.cb_id = cb.cb_id) AS "good" FROM community_board cb, member m WHERE classify = #{classify} AND enable = 1 AND cb.m_id = m.m_id AND reg_date BETWEEN CURDATE()-interval '100' day AND CURDATE() ORDER BY good DESC, hit DESC LIMIT 0, 9
SELECT lab.*, name FROM lost_animal_board lab, member m WHERE lab.m_id = m.m_id ORDER BY reg_date DESC LIMIT 0, 8
